about:
Hi guys my name is meteogold I like PvP and I love this server I joined this server when the server didnt have Nebula and spawn was mini. I played there at most Nexus and The Walls and now I'm playing at most nebula my favourites maps are:  Fantasy Volcano Halcyon and Luar. I am Gold and class prestige 1 and my dream is be very very veryX100 Pro on PvP because I love PvP

Greetings and Thanks for making this server !

Pd: srry for my bad English I am from spain
